document_data.mainbody:
Baric Nylef was a knight of Tyr that lived in Bryn Shander some time after the War of the Silver Marches.
Baric was a member of the Order of the Gauntlet.
In the late 15 century DR, Baric went to Bryn Shander to capture the notorious criminal Worvil Forkbeard, rumored to have hidden in the Ten Towns. He posed as a unemployed caravan guard drinking at the Kelvins Comfort tavern. Baric was at the tavern when giants attacked the city.
Baric was a true devotee of Tyr. He waited for the day when he would meet his god. In the meantime, he felt that he must clean the world from evil.
